pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a static shot of the magnificent facade of the Basilica of Santa Croce in Florence, Italy. The camera slowly zooms in on the intricate details of the Italian Gothic architecture, highlighting the white and green marble patterns, the large rose window, and the sculptures adorning the entrance under a brilliant blue sky.
